title: task_run_states
content: # `prefect.server.api.task_run_states` Routes for interacting with task run state objects. ## Functions ### `read_task_run_state` ```python theme={null} read_task_run_state(task_run_state_id: UUID = Path(..., description='The task run state id', alias='id'), db: PrefectDBInterface = Depends(provide_database_interface)) -> schemas.states.State ``` Get a task run state by id. For more information, see [https://docs.prefect.io/v3/concepts/tasks](https://docs.prefect.io/v3/concepts/tasks). ### `read_task_run_states` ```python theme={null} read_task_run_states(task_run_id: UUID, db: PrefectDBInterface = Depends(provide_database_interface)) -> List[schemas.states.State] ``` Get states associated with a task run.
